languages.text: "Я рад, что мы пришли к пониманию. Мы выждем, пока в районе не останется живых, способных разносить заразу. Потом аккуратно пропалим огнем и обкурим специальным составом. Это должно решить проблему".

"I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."
languages.original_text: "Я рад, что мы пришли к пониманию. Мы выждем, пока в районе не останется живых, способных разносить заразу. Потом аккуратно пропалим огнем и обкурим специальным составом. Это должно решить проблему".

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who could spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

"I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who could spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

"I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

languages.text: 「理解してもらえて嬉しいよ。病気を広める可能性のある者がいなくなるまで待つ予定だ。その後は念入りに該当する場所を焼いて、特別に混合した薬で燻蒸消毒する。それで問題は解決するはずだ」
languages.original_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

traits.locale_text: 「理解してもらえて嬉しいよ。病気を広める可能性のある者がいなくなるまで待つ予定だ。その後は念入りに該当する場所を焼いて、特別に混合した薬で燻蒸消毒する。それで問題は解決するはずだ」

languages.text: “我很高兴我们达成了共识。我们可以等到所有能传播这种疾病的人都一命呜呼，之后小心翼翼地把那个地方烧个干净，再用特殊的化合物进行熏蒸，这应该就足够解决问题了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴我们达成了共识。我们可以等到所有能传播这种疾病的人都一命呜呼，之后小心翼翼地把那个地方烧个干净，再用特殊的化合物进行熏蒸，这应该就足够解决问题了。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de que hayamos llegado a un entendido. Esperaremos hasta que no quede nadie que pueda transmitir la enfermedad. Luego quemaremos la zona con suma atención y la fumigaremos con un químico especial. Con eso debería zanjarse el problema».
languages.original_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de que hayamos llegado a un entendido. Esperaremos hasta que no quede nadie que pueda transmitir la enfermedad. Luego quemaremos la zona con suma atención y la fumigaremos con un químico especial. Con eso debería zanjarse el problema».

languages.text: « Je suis content que nous nous comprenions. Nous allons attendre que plus aucun être vivant ne soit en mesure de propager la maladie, après quoi nous purifierons les lieux par les flammes et les désinfecterons avec un produit spécial. Voilà qui devrait résoudre le problème. »
languages.original_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis content que nous nous comprenions. Nous allons attendre que plus aucun être vivant ne soit en mesure de propager la maladie, après quoi nous purifierons les lieux par les flammes et les désinfecterons avec un produit spécial. Voilà qui devrait résoudre le problème. »

languages.text: "Freut mich, dass wir uns einigen konnten. Wir werden warten, bis niemand mehr übrig ist, der die Krankheit verbreiten kann. Dann werden wir alles niederbrennen und mit einer speziellen Substanz ausräuchern. Damit dürfte das Problem gelöst sein."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich, dass wir uns einigen konnten. Wir werden warten, bis niemand mehr übrig ist, der die Krankheit verbreiten kann. Dann werden wir alles niederbrennen und mit einer speziellen Substanz ausräuchern. Damit dürfte das Problem gelöst sein."

languages.text: "Birbirimizi anladığımıza sevindim. Hastalığı yayabilecek kimse kalmayana kadar bekleyeceğiz. Sonra titizlikle mekânı yakacak ve özel bir bileşenle dezenfekte edeceğiz. Sorun da böylece çözülecek."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad we've come to an understanding. We will wait until there is no one left alive who can spread the disease. Then we'll meticulously burn the place and fumigate it with a special compound. That should solve the problem."

traits.locale_text: "Birbirimizi anladığımıza sevindim. Hastalığı yayabilecek kimse kalmayana kadar bekleyeceğiz. Sonra titizlikle mekânı yakacak ve özel bir bileşikle dezenfekte edeceğiz. Sorun da böylece çözülecektir."
